param.name: bridge_path
param.label: Bridge Path:
param.description: Path relative to Joomla! root for forum bridge

param.name: phpbb3_path
param.label: phpBB3 Path:
param.description: Path relative to Joomla! root for phpBB3 forum

param.name: sef_enable
param.label: SEF Enabled
param.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Enable SEF URLs in the bridge

param.name: sef_rewrite
param.label: SEF Rewrite
param.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Enable Apache SEF Rewrite URLs in the bridge. Requires SEF Enabled to be true

param.name: link_format
param.label: Link Format
param.description: Controls the kind of links used in Joomla

param.name: create_user_immediately
param.label: Create User immediately
param.description: Create a user in the phpBB3 along with the Joomla

param.name: user_inactive
param.label: Inactive created User
param.description: Make immediately created User inactive (disabled) if needs (EXPERIMENTAL)

param.name: group_id
param.label: User group Id
param.description: Add user was created immediately to the group with this Id (see field 'group_id' in table 'phpbb_groups')

param.name: user_new
param.label: Newly Registered Users group
param.description: Add user was created immediately to the Newly Registered Users group

param.name: user_delete_mode
param.label: User delete mode
param.description: Retain or Remove posts and topics of the deleted user

param.name: save_post_username
param.label: Save posts' username
param.description: Save posts' username of the deleted user or replace it with Guest username
